CustomField.description: When checked, the Business Group is enabled for e-invoicing and can connect to a Payment Gateway for e-payment processing. When unchecked, a Parent Business Group must be designated. Defaults checked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When checked, the Business Group is enabled for e-invoicing and can connect to a Payment Gateway for e-payment processing. When unchecked, a Parent Business Group must be designated. Defaults checked.
CustomField.label: Is Master
